Sentencas: Renewable energy installation capacity has rapidly increased in recent years.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: Subsequently, developing and commercializing large energy storage systems (ESSs) has become an important research objective.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: To evaluate development and compare between different ESSs, levelized cost of energy storage (LCOES) has been used.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: However, current LCOES often includes cost of electricity production in total investment, and neglects off-design characteristic of ESSs.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: Therefore, we proposed a new definition for the LCOES (LCOES2) to resolve these problems.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: An ESS using RSOFC coupled with waste steam was investigated for ESS efficiency characterization.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: The proposed ESSs and LCOES calculations were applied to South Korea case.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: The hourly average solar power data for each month was used.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: Hydrogen production and consumption were matched for sizing ESS and estimating electricity demand profile.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: The results show that, conventional LCOES, which considers charging electricity cost, overestimated the cost by 7.7% and 14.8% compared to the LCOES2, at RSOFC stack cost of $700/kW and $225/kW, respectively.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: The constant part load efficiency model resulted in lower LCOES values, by up to 6.3%, due to higher overall round-trip efficiency.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell

Sentencas: The new LCOES definition, considering variable part-load efficiency, was proved to be an efficiency-sensitive and reliable cost indicator.
Titulo: New definition of levelized cost of energy storage and its application to reversible solid oxide fuel-cell
